page.title: 11Lute Making In Wootton
page.content: A man called Mr Lowe owns a workshop in Wootton.He makes lutes,but also plays the organ in Wootton Church.He learnt to play the organ by himself.He also plays in a group.Mr Lowe plays other intruments too.He first made a lute when he was 8 years old,he made it to play.It takes 2 months on average to make a lute.He has been making lutes professionally for 12 years.The biggest one he has made was 6 feet long.Someone brought it for 1500 pounds.Most lutes he sells are for 1000 pounds.Mr Lowe has sold some to famous people.When we had visited him he had made 79 lutes.
